headline: AMD stock falls on MI450-series delay rumors
summary: Investing.com -- Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ:AMD) stock declined Friday, falling as much as 6% before paring losses to around 3%, following reports that the company’s next-generation MI450-series AI accelerators might face delays.

headline: AMD Stock Is Setting Up Bullishly Before Earnings. Watch Out For This.
summary: AMD stock is a character study in reversals both near the top and the bottom — a pattern that might prove critical as the company prepares to announce its earnings next week.  AMD stock has formed a bullish, three-month cup base and appears to be on the cusp of etching out a handle.  AMD is expected to report quarterly earnings per share of $1.32 and revenue of $9.65 billion according to a FactSet poll of analysts. For the following quarter, analysts are predicting earnings per share of $1.23 and revenue of $9.38 billion.

headline: QuantumScape Welcomes Tech Industry Veteran Geoff Ribar to Board of Directors
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., January 30, 2026--QuantumScape Corporation (NASDAQ: QS), a global leader in next-generation solid-state lithium-metal battery technology, today announced the appointment of Geoff Ribar to its board of directors. Ribar brings deep expertise and extensive leadership experience in the technology industry, with decades serving as CFO for companies across the sector.

headline: AI Chips Today - Global AI Infrastructure Partnership Tackles Data Center Strain
summary: Datalec Precision Installations (DPI) and PODTECH have formed a global technology partnership to enhance the availability of AI infrastructure solutions, as demand for such services intensifies due to strained data center capacities across Europe, Asia, and the Middle East. This collaboration aims to address significant bottlenecks in AI data center deployment, with current vacancy rates dropping to historical lows. PODTECH contributes its expertise in environmental telemetry, power systems,...

headline: AMD Gigabyte AI Gaming Tie Up And What It Means For Valuation
summary: AMD (NasdaqGS:AMD) and GIGABYTE announced an expanded partnership to launch AI-focused gaming laptops, motherboards, and OLED monitors. The new products center on on-device AI acceleration, system level integration, and consumer facing AI features for gaming and content creation. The collaboration targets AI use directly on PCs and gaming systems rather than only in data center environments. For you as an investor following AMD (NasdaqGS:AMD), this move sits at the intersection of gaming,...
